Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty good during the day but I initially had trouble with the night vision. The direction where the camera was pointing received lots of IR bounce back. However while panning the camera, I noticed that the night vision was very good in spots. At first I thought the dome was dirty so I cleaned it. It turned out to be a slight defect in the dome that was causing the bounce back. I removed the housing and repositioned the dome and it now works great. Now, the dome section giving me trouble is on the back side of the camera which can't be reached.

Reviews.Title: Could be worse
Reviews.Author: King Of Reviews
Reviews.Content: Interface is slow when connected out of home/business network. Was relatively easy to install and forward ports for out of network connection.Pros:1. Super fast movement when pan and tilting (again slows down when out of network and the lag causes multiple direction moves)2. Clean crisp images in the daytime.3. Looks stylish.Cons:1. DOES NOT RECORED VIDEO! REGARDLESS OF WHAT APP YOU USE! The description I saw when ordering stated it had this capability.2. Inferred LEAVES A LOT TO BE DESIRED, even at less than 10 feet, the clarity is shoddy at best.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Ewen
Reviews.Content: Love it would recommend it.  Had a little difficulty connecting to Wi Fi, I called Foscam support and they got it connected in less time than I tried.  Was on hold for less than 30 seconds before I got great help,.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera, bad support
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: I'm ok with this camera, but I'd return it if I could.  There are two errors in the owner's manual (one being the 1-10 sensitivity scale) so you have to troubleshoot with apathetic customer support from the start.  There isn't a happy medium between catching every shadow that moves and not catching anything.  Unfortunately, someone broke into my house, walking right by the camera, and it wasn't caught at all.  I'd spend a little more money for something better.Cons:1. It takes a lot of constant movement for the video recording to be triggered2. It catches people walking down my deck but not walking back up (thus catching their face) no matter the time interval3. Must use Internet Explorer or IE extension to record/ stop/ rewindPros:1. The ability to pan at any angle2. Pretty good image quality3. I was able to set it up myself.  Mount it, run cables through the attic, connect IP, and voila.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For Monitoring The Front Door
Reviews.Author: Social Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: I've incorporated this camera into a MIOS mesh network. I'm satisfied with the functionality of the camera during both day and night. I've already decided to buy another to put in my backyard so I can keep an eye on my dogs when they are outside.  Unless there is a power outage, the camera never resets. As long as you understand how to make the camera's ip adress permanent, you'll have no trouble like some reviews have described. This is a good camera that allows me to keep an eye out on my front door and driveway no matter where I am.

Reviews.Title: Decent quality camera
Reviews.Author: Mesimo "messik"
Reviews.Content: I received the camera about a week ago. When you get it, make sure you do the setup first then leave it close by where you can test it for a couple of days before you install it. The instructions for port forwarding, etc were pretty straight forward, so I was up and running in no time, able to view and move the camera over my iphone. Night vision was also decent, I have a back yard of about 5,000 sq ft, this shows most of it at night with far corners being barely visible, but I'll take it.The rotation is not full 360 deg like it says. It has a stop-turn, so it's 359 degrees. Usually not a problem, unless you have to install the camera backwards, then it's a major annoyance.  I installed mine on roof studs from inside between wall and roof and the antenna got in the way (not bended as is shown in the picture), so I drilled a new hole and brought it out from the side.Overall, I'm pretty happy with the quality of the camera itself, but the resolution could be better. One issue I have is with shadows - when one part is sunny and one part is shady, it shows the shady parts as pitch black, until you move the camera toward the shady part then the contrast adjusts. The difference between light and dark is a bit too extreme. Less of an issue, but still a minor irritant - the wide angle view or the lack of it.Lack of zoom is another issue, but in my case I am happy this doesn't have zoom and audio because it's installed in my back yard and if someone gains control of the camera over the internet I don't want them to look inside my house. However, the other camera that I buy for the front of the house will probably be 720p with zoom and audio.

Reviews.Title: Unstable/crashes
Reviews.Author: Troy R. Baldwin
Reviews.Content: Night vision is sub-par.Not a PTZ (no zoom)Wont run full 640/480 without glitching. I have to run at 320/240 which looks like crap.Crashes at least once a week or more. Pretty tough to push the reset button when its 25' up on the side of a barn.No firmware updates available ever since I bought this in 2012.I would NOT recommend this camera at all. I wish I had never bought this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: They work okay sometimes
Reviews.Author: Computerized Nurse
Reviews.Content: But not most of the time. Still, for the price, and that they do work some of the time, they are a great deterrent..

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a replacement for a camera in our camera network we have in our calving barn. We use these camera to oversee our cattle when we they are birthing calves. The number on this camera is different from the other cameras and we are having trouble getting this camera to work properly. Not sure what the problem is yet. These cameras need to be sealed better as they get dirty inside and they are cheaply made. We have 4 cameras at our barn, 2 inside and 2 outside and the outside cameras are the ones we have trouble with. We may have to look at purchasing a more expensive camera for the outside pens. Service after the sale is not much help. Thank goodness our son has knowledge to help us.

Reviews.Title: IP camera support
Reviews.Author: Jerry Dickerson
Reviews.Content: Calvin was very helpful and timely. He was very patient, very professionsl & very willing to answer questions. I appreciate his helpful manner & knowledge.

Reviews.Title: Great Pan/Tilt on a budget..
Reviews.Author: aj4mq
Reviews.Content: Controllable by browser or cellphone, this camera can be reached from anywhere provided you open up your firewall. the picture makes it look like a plastic case, but it is a very nice hard metal shell. As for waterproof, it looks like it could be, but the back is open to the elements, including a network port (for programming), a reset button (nice addition), and a power connector (standard CCTV). The antenna in the picture bends, but the one I received did not.So what are my concerns? Does not record. Slow panning, until you find the speed setting in the control panel, then it moves quite fast. No zoom, CMOS camera. Did not get to see night response, but very decent picture. preprogrammable positions, but I didn't see a way to tell it which one to go to.. Auto pans on power-up in seemingly random, but probably normal directions. clicking the center button on the console returns it to pan mode..For the beginner, this is a confusing camera. however, if you work with it a bit, could be very handy. Recommend caulk on the mounting point to prevent moisture, but remember to leave a hole at the bottom so it can breathe (very important). Not sure what to water-protect the RJ-45 connector with, so be careful.Programmable from Windows 8.1 (may need to add better firewall exception: advanced-> check all 3, allow edge)No command wire (PTZ), no video output (wireless/wired only).Does not need to be wireless...

Reviews.Title: excellent camera and I am very happy
Reviews.Author: Kirpal Aquézolo
Reviews.Content: is an excellent camera and I'm very happy with the product.What I want is a place to find some software for managing internet entirely by both local networks and remote networks.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Very Frustrated
Reviews.Author: BobbyJinx
Reviews.Content: I have to say tat this camera looks very nice and may be used as a dummy cam but that's about it. You can set it up for email notifications but it will blow up your email. It will not stay connected to your network even wit a static IP. My loss because I thought there was hope so I held on to it for so long that I can't do anything with it anymore!

Reviews.Title: Strong concept, but with technical limitations
Reviews.Author: Edward Wright
Reviews.Content: Night performance and picture resolution (IR) is seriously degraded by a "light ring" that surrounds the image. Software is clunky. Camera is not easy to set up and configure for one with limited computer skills. Resolution is average.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Support
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Riley
Reviews.Content: Technical Support did an excellent job in resolving my wireless connection with my camera.  I am so glad that I purchased a camera that I can call a support number for help.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Andrew
Reviews.Author: Buyakdog
Reviews.Content: finally after 3 weeks, Andrew at the Tech Support got my cameras; set up and working remotely. I learned more in 20 minutes with him than I did in 3 weeks by myself or with the other techs.  Thank you Andrew

Reviews.Title: Great day time, OK night, so so on Wireless.
Reviews.Author: Airstreaming Harley "Michael"
Reviews.Content: Easy to put up and setup, but usage on wireless network takes some effort to get on full wireless network.

Reviews.Title: tect support was great
Reviews.Author: M. Smith
Reviews.Content: could not find devise on laptop, had to contact customer support they remotely logged in did the wireless settings and also did the port forwarding , and also guided how to add on to the android phone. My support person was Felix

Reviews.Title: not that much
Reviews.Author: visitor
Reviews.Content: i bout this item and it seems there is no zoom in/out for this productand the night vision out of focus

Reviews.Title: Would not connect and had HUGE halo when it did work
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dddeans"
Reviews.Content: The company asked me to return both of these since they could not make them work.  Go with the Brand name Foscam.  You will get foscam support when you call on this one, but its not the same quality.  Spend the extra 30 and get hassle free performance.

Reviews.Title: Lasted one year
Reviews.Author: Dude
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in February 2012. It lasted 13 months and was then  out of warranty. It constantly locked up on wireless mode. The software very basic and the menu is confusing. Thanks to my credit card concierge service...I was refunded the purchase price. I would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: OK camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Randall Catalano
Reviews.Content: All the reviews complain about the night vision halo that leaves a small circle of visability.  If exterior lights come on the entire view comes back, however.  One out of three cameras was out of focus and I was told by Foscam that there's no way to focus the camera.  After 2 weeks I had to get an RMA.  The customer must pay to return the product and Foscam pays to ship the replacement camera back to you.  Not ideal.  Daytime viewing is OK however if you have any glare from the camera cover, the picture flashs bright to dark every few seconds causing errent triggers.  This especially happens during late afternoons when the sun is low.  I discovered that the wireless range varies and will not work well through exterior walls, hence the CAT6 cables.  These cameras are setup to monitor a remote property and are serviing their purpose.

Reviews.Title: Its Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Doug Dienelt
Reviews.Content: This camera is my first venture into the IP camera world. Or any surveillance camera for that matter. I wanted something to keep an eye on my back yard and pool. Despite the less than favorable reviews I decided that this camera at least looks like the best one. None of the IP cameras that are P/T are rated very well which I am guessing the reason for that is they are all made fairly cheaply. I was impressed with the camera once I got it. It is an all aluminum housing. The dome is plastic. I wanted night vision capabilities however I am not too picky on how much detail I get. A lot of people seem to complain about the "Halo" at night when the IRs are on. No one has uploaded a photo so I could only assume how bad it would be. Much to my surprise, it wasn't toooooo bad. I have attached a photo. If the dome were constructed of glass I would imagine that this really wouldn't be an issue however that may bring on a whole other set of issues. I had a tough time getting it hooked up. I called tech support and they had it up and running in a few minutes. Excellent support there. My HUGE issue is the reliability of the WX connection. The camera has to be hooked up to the ethernet cable to set it up and the WX up. So after tech support got it working, I went and installed it up on a pole. It worked for a few minutes then went kaput. It had power, I saw the LEDs on but it would not work. So up I went to retrieve the camera only to have to hook it back up to the ethernet cable and load the backup settings file I had saved before I unplugged it. It began working again so I put it back up on the pole and so far its working perfect but my trust is pretty low. I hope it was an isolated glitch because hooking it up to the ethernet cable is not an option for me. Overall, excellent camera, the daytime video is pretty good and night time isn't horrible. I would buy another one if I needed it but for reliability I would hook it up with the ethernet cable.

Reviews.Title: not working at all irregardless if I followed directions step by step
Reviews.Author: en
Reviews.Content: fast delivery but not working at all irregardless if I followed instructions to install step by step; I even put off firewall temporarily as per instructions

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: emac66 "emac66"
Reviews.Content: I searched along time for the right IP Wireless Security Camera and I believe I picked a winner. easy to get up and rolling. Only thing, I wish were different  would be the fact they use a mini cd for installing your software on to your laptop or PC. My laptop wouldn't accept the mini cd. They do offer another way to complete this though, just go to foscam.com and you are able to download the software there,as I did. other then that for the price this camera is the answer to what I needed.The  Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless Pan/Tilt IP Camera is very attractive and fits in well on the front of my house. It is a statement for being a deterrent for anyone wanting to cone to my house with out us being here. I was surprised how well it blended in to the house without making it look like an eyesore or a compound look.Basically, download your software, put in a few screws,power the Camera and you're ready to view. I was lucky and able to go through the wall of my garage. I drilled a 1" hole to bring the camera cord through and plugged in to the power right there. Easy enough.

Reviews.Title: decent but hard to setup
Reviews.Author: Navat
Reviews.Content: Freezes on the first day but after a power reset.  No problem for 2 weeks now.  The day mode is decent but night is terrible.  There's a glare ring due to the glass.  If you don't have a pc with a DVD to install the software then good luck.  I couldnt find the same program online.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tom Taormina
Reviews.Content: Compared to my Tenevis cameras, the quality is poor. The PT function is difficult to use. One camera resets its PT once a day by itself.

Reviews.Title: settings support
Reviews.Author: Its a great way to gat your mind back on trac...
Reviews.Content: service was most helpful Calvin set up my camera for the second time, very good results. camera works very good and can be viewed anywhere in the world.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Easy and convenient
Reviews.Author: David Baker
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and operate.  I would recommend this model to anyone that wants to keep an eye on their neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: What a waste of time and resources!
Reviews.Author: Felipe
Reviews.Content: I have used IP cameras for almost 8 years already, and this product is the worse I have seen around. The firmware is a joke, and it didn't even work. Foscam had the audacity to put a "quality check certificate" inside the box. Returning them immediately. Seriously, do not waste you money on these. You will regret it.Amazon.com as always, send everything in a timely manner and assisted in the return. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: be careful.....
Reviews.Author: hac
Reviews.Content: i have owned this since 1/5/13 and while it is still working, there is absolutely no firmware support. the Agasio webpage is useless unless you want to purchase something, the support page link to the firmware update page that has not changed since i have owned it. Based on post to  forums (search Agasio A622W) there appears to never have been any updates available. i wish i had gone with the near identical Foscam model. That model has b/g/n, too. i email customer support and although i got a timely response, it was "Unfortunately, there are no firmware updates available at the moment"i feel stuck. should have researched better b/f i dropped $160.00based on other reviews, i am just glad it still works

Reviews.Title: It works for me...
Reviews.Author: Dave K.
Reviews.Content: Yes, it's a bit tricky to set up. And yes, it's a bit tricky to mount. And yes, the IR self-reflection makes it only partially useful at night. But overall, this camera has proven extremely clear and reliable for me. Maybe that's because I have the power supply plugged into an APC UPS, and I am strictly using a wired CAT-5e connection. But in any case, it NEVER gets hung up or self-resets in my installation.I've also got it working great in several mobile apps by setting it up as a Foscam 8918.  It's great fun to be able to view it on your smart phone from anywhere in the world.Considering the price, I rate this camera as 'okay" (not great, but not terrible either).By the way, if you want a suggestion on how to mount this camera on an outside corner for maximum visibility across 270 horizontal egrees, please see my review for the Vonnic B521  Camera Bracket Corner Mounting For PTZ Cameras Retail. Not for beginners, but it's at least an option.

Reviews.Title: will need some tech support
Reviews.Author: Jeff Holte
Reviews.Content: had a little trouble out of the box but called Irish with tech support and he had me up and running in 15 min.

Reviews.Title: A622W Outdoor Wireless
Reviews.Author: Greg Boyd
Reviews.Content: Great Camera and the support is very good as well ! I would recommend this product for outdoor Wireless applications!

Reviews.Title: Works great in daylight, some reflection issues at night
Reviews.Author: Onepingonly "onepingonly"
Reviews.Content: Camera performs well.  If you plan on using IR for night viewing, you will get a halo effect of light bouncing off the dome.  The cure would be to mount IR outside of cover.

Reviews.Title: Purchased by Saeid maghdouri for my peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Saeid Maghdouri
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and working good, The only problem that Not all the times you could have a clear images.

Reviews.Title: Its too sensitive
Reviews.Author: Susie
Reviews.Content: The motion detector is too sensitive and sends tons of useless emails that clog up my inbox. The quality of the pictures is good though

Reviews.Title: cameras a622 Agaso
Reviews.Author: Late night reader
Reviews.Content: night ir refection in dome makes it not useable at night otherwise camera is as advertised.  i have 3 foscam cameras and have had problems with remote accesss. foscam support has helped me several times and Calvin said he has the problem corrected. support has helped each time & i would rate sarvice good. time to answer phone has improved.

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless IP camera
Reviews.Author: gdsffpm
Reviews.Content: So far so good: Easy to install and config for wireless using Blue Iris software. Pan is a bit slow although I'm about 100' from router. Haven't seen IR yet or how that looks at night. Will update after more exposure. Camera looks good for appearance and fits into other fixtures.

Reviews.Title: Average camera
Reviews.Author: Gbitt.
Reviews.Content: This camera did a reasonable job.  I believe the reception to the wireless could use some boost, but the videowas acceptable for the cost of the item.

Reviews.Title: Foscam/Agasio support
Reviews.Author: kingDavid
Reviews.Content: I could not access my Agasio IP cam unless connected to my original setup router.  With all IP cameras, I wanted to access using my iphone or other PC from anywhere.  The customer service rep fixed the problem.  The wait was about 15 minutes on hold, but the service was good.

Reviews.Title: Technical support
Reviews.Author: Kristin Wiese
Reviews.Content: Quick response to my technical issue with the browser and successfully solved my problem. Thank you Ralph Mendez. I like being able to access this camera remotely through my Iphone and other devices.

Reviews.Title: Compared to cheaper off-brand and not-so cheap Foscam IP pan-tilt cams, this is a rugged, nice looking unit.
Reviews.Author: Pragmatic
Reviews.Content: The Good: Has a very strong, nicely finished professional looking die cast housing suitable for outdoor use. The IR cut filter is real nice for real-color viewing during daylight hours. We won't buy any cameras in the future without IR cut filters.The Bad: The only significant design issue is the nighttime IR reflections on the interior of the dome. And there is currently NO software control to turn off the IR LEDs. only option would be to opening the dome and doing a field mod inserting a power switch to the LEDS which would void the warranty. Are you listening (again) Agasio? This is the second review on Amazon, stating the IR LED dome reflections on this product are a significant problem? Note that there are no reflections or distortion issues during daytime use.Summary: If outdoor daytime use is your primary application, don't hesitate to get this very well constructed camera. If nighttime IR use is your primary application, we recommend you look elsewhere. We give this one a 3.5 rounded up to a 4 rating.

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Tom Cove
Reviews.Content: One mounting screw is difficult to get at .Picture is good.Night pictures are ok.Difficult to find other software for camera.

Reviews.Title: Good ip camera
Reviews.Author: garyznola
Reviews.Content: I don't know, I guess maybe I was expecting more with this camera.  Even though I read the description and many of the reviews, I got this camera based on the fact that it faired better in the reviews than the other camera I was looking at.  The other camera had more features such as zoom and audio, but I got this camera instead because it did better review wise.  While this camera is very good at what capabilities it has, I really wish it had zoom and audio capabilities, then it would be perfect.  It does kind of sleep when I am in monitor mode when viewing together with my other cameras, but it readily wakes up when I go strictly to it.  Good camera, installed easily and is working great especially the clear color during the day.  I've got the dreaded halo during night viewing, but that is probably due to the street light within its field because it goes away as I pan away from that area.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Allen
Reviews.Content: Very good picture during the day.  Night time pic is not that great but for the money I canot complain.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Keith S
Reviews.Content: Excellent daytime pictures.  Night vision DOES have a reflection from the IR/Dome, but I find it acceptable and usable.My one complaint is wifi was weak through my block house, so I ran an ethernet cable for a more reliable and faster connection.Overall, I'd buy another one.  Tech support is excellent (Foscam), WHEN you can get through.

Reviews.Title: Fair at best
Reviews.Author: T. Martin
Reviews.Content: We purchased 2 of these cameras to remote view our home. As in the other reviews the instructions are poor a best. I recommend downloading the manuals online because reading the book with the small letters is a challenge. After 2 hours of testing and setup, I found the first camera to be defective on wireless. A call to the service line resulted in nothing but more frustration. After another hour of trying to understand the accent, she recommended to return it to Amazon. The second camera works as described, had no issues setting up on my network. I have never done any port forwarding, IP work before, but found it easy with some help from YouTube and Google. I was able to set up a DNS server and remote view my camera on all my wireless devices.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable picture and controls for the price; problematic video, no pre-set on reboot
Reviews.Author: Doug Warner "Doug"
Reviews.Content: This camera has good pan/tilt controls and picture for the price.  As other reviewers have stated, the focus is a little out when you receive it and needs adjusted.I occasionally have problems with the video after a restart, which this camera seems to do about daily.  Another problem with the restarts is that it doesn't have a setting to return to a pre-set after it boots, so regardless of where you were setting previously, you'll need to re-set the position about every day unless you come up with a workaround (you can script a request to /decoder_control.cgi?command=31 for preset 1, command 33 for preset 2, etc).

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The camera is great but the software isn't the greatest so I went with blue iris, there is free software but not with the features I want to use. At night the clear cover has a halo effect from the IR lights. I can live with that.

Reviews.Title: solid
Reviews.Author: desertfox "desert fox"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased many different cameras searching for the best bang for the buck and this unit isn't too bad. Let me start by saying that I only use these for wired Ethernet connections as WiFi on any of these cameras is woefully inadequate, even if the device is sitting in immediate proximity to the WiFi router. The cable is a little difficult to work with as it will not fit through a 1" hole when installing. Had to drill 1.25". The exterior is metal, feeling much more solid than most of the other units I have tried. This is the only dome cam I have purchased where the entire dome rotates instead of the cam rotating inside a dome. There is some halo effect from IR since they are inside the dome but it really isn't too bad. Color is nice, range of motion is nice. It recognizes the other Loftek, WansView and Foscam units in MultiDev in the built-in web browser software. Works well in Blue Iris too. Time will tell if it is one I would re-purchase but all signs point to this being a solid value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Surprising Quality!
Reviews.Author: cruceskeith "CrucesKeith"
Reviews.Content: PRO:I am very impressed with the solid construction of this camera! The camera feed is crisp & clear. Night vision is also clear with no "halo" as with other infra red night vision cameras. The PTZ functions perfectly, (drive motors are a little louder than expected), and oddly, the entire dome rotates, not just the internal camera. In spite of that odd quirk, it's still an excellent camera! The wireless connection appears to works flawlessly, once connected.CON:Less than stellar software. Very limited! You 1st need to connect and set up with the Ethernet cable before you can use the wireless function. (This is typical). Good luck finding your IP address. Having to use the web browser to set up the camera properties is awkward at best. A security camera novice or 1st time home owner would get very frustrated very quickly, so try to remain patient. The software is supplied via a mini CD, making it impossible to use on a Mac Mini running Windows or a side load CD/DVD tray.Requiring access to a power supply within 3 feet of the camera placement could require the services of a qualified electrician. Additionally, you will need a weather proof electrical box within one foot to enclose the power connection. All this could get pretty costly, if you're not the "do-it-yourself" type.This camera IS NOT PoE!(Power over Ethernet). Meaning you HAVE to use the power supply plug. If you have a power failure, you lose your camera feed.RECOMMENDATIONS:BUY THIS CAMERA! But, don't bother with the supplied limited software. I use iSpy (free, Windows only, no mac) camera software. It's the perfect compliment to the AWESOME camera! Download and install iSpy 1st, 2nd connect the camera, then follow the instructions for setting up your camera. Much easier and more options than the supplies software. This camera packs a BIG BANG for your buck! I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera-Pretty good for the money!
Reviews.Author: PJK1954 "marian3410"
Reviews.Content: I have several Foscam and Agasio wireless IP outdoor video cameras with night vision and 1 wireless IP Panasonic ($500+) still camera (no night vision).  The Foscams operate pretty well and for the price are worth it.  Not as reliable as the Panasonc, but look at the price differential ! Sometimes they drop the wireless signal, but Kate, from tech support was very helpful ! We'll see if what she changed worked ! I would recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Item review
Reviews.Author: MW
Reviews.Content: The unit performs well using third party viewer software.  The supplied software is cumbersome and requires that firewalls and security be disabled to access the unit.

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless Camera
Reviews.Author: Liz Brazeau
Reviews.Content: The product appears to be well made and is a nice looking product. The only issue I encountered was connecting it up to my Mac Computer. It is not very clear in the manual. It took me about 3 to 4 tries to get it working properly. Once it connected wirelessly it has been working fine. I was able to download the Foscam app pro to my IPad and it also worked fine,but it is not clearly spelled out in the manual . I have Dlink cameras and they are very easy to configure. I do plan on purchasing another Agasio for my condo in Florida for outdoor use. Hopefully it will be easier this time around.

Reviews.Title: Right Price
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Just what I was waiting for in an outdoor ip camera. Good investment in security for those on a budget and would like a system that covers nighttime recording.

Reviews.Title: Agasio
Reviews.Author: Paul C. Sider
Reviews.Content: I want to say that I was assisted by a Mr. Calvin and I wasOn 11/18/2013 Mr. Calvin helped me with the most professional assistance one can ask for.  I am saying thanks to him because he made my day very pleasant not to make this a problem.  Thank you Mr. Calvin.

Reviews.Title: What a hunk of junk
Reviews.Author: chevyssgal "chevyssgal"
Reviews.Content: I am not a computer genius but I did work for a high tech company for more than 18 years.  I can not figure out for the life of me how to get this camera to record which is what the camera was purchased for.The night vision is lame at best.The one thing I can say that is nice about this camera is that it was easy to install.  It's too bad the functionality is so poorly defined that you can't get it to do what it is advertised to do - So SHAME ON AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: It was junk!
Reviews.Author: K. B. Smith "poppy"
Reviews.Content: It did not power up. Phone number to service did not work. The bad camera was sent back for credit.,

Reviews.Title: Great camera great service
Reviews.Author: Ron Hollenback
Reviews.Content: Just hooked this camera up at our lake property.  Great video.... Had a few initial problems getting it setup but the Agasio technician quickly walked me through the final setup. Works great.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Michelle Phillips
Reviews.Content: excellent product and great tech support has great picture quality and excellent range definitely reccomend this camera had it for 2 years now

Reviews.Title: Great IP PT outdoor camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Brian J.
Reviews.Content: I've only been using this camera for about one week.  But it is exactly as describe. It has a very good picture for a security camera.  I used it on my laptop, desktop andiPhone with no problems.  Setting up the port forwarding is a little tricky if you have not done it before. The included directions were not enough.  I did find what I neededby searching the web for this model camera.  Also I'm using this as a wired camera and purchased the power over ethernet (POE) adapter sold on amazon.  The POE is a greataddon,  this allows me to run a singe cable and keep the power supply plug back in the house by my router.  The only thing I wish was included was software to runon a Apple laptop, security software for mac is not very common, and I don't want to use windows just for this camera.  I can control and view this camera withsafari on my mac.  But I cannot record videos.  Since this camera can be set to send up to 6 snap shoots as attachments in a email when it senses motion, I will be usingthis feature instead of recording.  The motion sensor is very sensitive.  Unlike a few other reviews I don't see any halo affect when using the infrared lights in the dark.Also the camera is more that sensitive in low light for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Ronald Disanto
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera but is tricky to set up. Computer skills are a must. If you are really determined it can be figured out. I didn't know anything about "ip cameras" & "port forwarding" at first but do now. Foscam's tech support is very helpful and will remotely take over your computer and do it for you if you can't. Just pay attention and learn.  This camera however did fall off line twice on me and the night vision was not good. The infra red light bounces off the glass bubble back into the camera and makes a halo. I ended up returning the camera but learned a lot:)

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Savannah
Reviews.Content: This IP Camera is by no means top of the line, but with all its features it is a good buy.  At .3 megapixel (640x480) is a bit small but does the job depending on your application.  I bought two of these and everything works as advertised. Video quality is excellent on daylight and at night with IR turned off if outdoor lighting is good.  My only gripe is the IR glare from the dome at night, it is better than no night vision but the halo is a bit too much.The WiFi range is marginal especially since it will be installed outside and depending on the location of the router your signal might drop from time to time.  Maybe with extended range antennas could make it work better, using a wireless repeater, or connecting through ethernet would be even better. Either way I will be improving the signal by some means.I use these cameras with the Blue Iris software running on a PC, 24hr a day.  The software ties everything together nicelly expanding the cam's usability, and the web UI must also be used for parts of the configuration and use as well since Blue Iris doesn't cover every operation or programing of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera and Trouble Free after 5 months
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera about 5 months ago with no problems to date. Always on and working via the laptop or my Android phone. When I first installed the camera I used it both hard wired and wireless. I had no problems operating it wireless mode except a second or two of lag time while panning around. In the end It was easy for me to just wire the camera into the network for best operation. The wireless and wired software and network installations were no problem as the manual was very clear on how to install and configure the camera. I had the camera up and  test running in 10 minutes. The browser interface that comes with works best in Explorer (I'm using 9) all the features work. Chrome and Firefox (My Fav) a few of the camera controls are missing or not working and that to bad because IE and I don't get along well. The camera works with many different types of IP Cam Viewers on the Net for download and most are Free if you hunt around. The ones listed on Agasio's site work well  Try them all and pick the one you like. I also tried several different Android viewer apps before I decided on one that worked best for me. Connecting and using DNS was problem free as well. I used dyn dns as my provider. I had never used DNS before. The set up was fairly smooth, the cam manual instructions made all the difference. Note: After  the Camera, router and DNS was set up the camera didn't work right away or worked on and off. After reading The help section on the DNS site it can take up to 72 hours for The IP addresses to work properly in the net.In my opinion the camera is well made, all metal and the clear globe appears to be glass so it's stayed clean on it's own. I have the camera installed out in the open with no protection, so far the camera hasn't leaked or shown any signs of weather damage. I'm in the south and we have had many heavy storms this last winter and spring.Daylight picture quality is good and in focus I able to clearly see anything on my property that the camera is able to pan to. Images and video that the camera takes in daylight hours are acceptable to good quality. I have all settings set to High Quality. Night viewing is fair to poor at best. There is a halo affect while viewing from the night vision lights that reflects back at the camera lens making for poor viewing. You have the ability to turn off the night vision lights and if your lucky like me I have a street light that provides enough light to view my property good enough. I also have a 4 cam system with a DVR. It's a middle of the road system and gets the job done. This Agasio IP Dome cam has much better picture quality and better color than the more expensive DVR cams I have. I would give this camera 5 stars if it wasn't for the halo reflection making for poor viewing quality at night which I believe is a very important time when one would want the best quality viewing and recording should the need arise. I just ordered Agasio's model with the smoked globe and zoom feature for a large area of my property that is out of view. I'm hoping that not having night vision lights and the smoked globe will work better for me at night with the building lights that are on all night in this area. I think these cameras are a good value for what they do,  my trouble free usage for 5 mounts now for under $200. I'll report back any improvements or problems on this new model Agsio camera I have ordered.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: S. LLOYD "Glastarguy"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Agasio camera for me.  Both installed at a remote location.  Both work great.  Easy to install.  I connect remotely.  Need to know DDNS.

Reviews.Title: Survived a Louisiana Hurricane
Reviews.Author: Trevor C.
Reviews.Content: For the price you will not find an outdoor rated Pan Tilt IP cam with night vision. So far it has survived the Louisiana weather and served our need quite well. My only two wishes would be to make it PoE and have the camera go up to the next resolution to make a 1.3Mp.I would gladly pay more for these two features.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: RDonaldson
Reviews.Content: First camera wireless failed within 2 weeks. Replacement camera has worked very well. Strengths are very clear, easy to install and set up, good night vision, presets are great to look at multiple areas. Weaknesses, could use better zoom,  Does not reboot well.

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622W Outdoor security wireless camera
Reviews.Author: A Ma
Reviews.Content: The camera works well.  I just hope that the photo screen angle is wider.  It needs a computer on 24/7.  I am thinking to investa separate monitor for it.  Overall it is worth the price we paid for!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera with Excellent customer !
Reviews.Author: Joyce ~ Massachusetts
Reviews.Content: This is my 6th camera, and I am VERY pleased with the camera as well as the customer support. I did have to contact the Foscam customer service, as the Agasio service telephone number was not in service.In less than 30 minutes, my camera was up and running!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great quality build product for the price
Reviews.Author: Michelle Ge
Reviews.Content: We mounted this unit on the front patio, under cover. The product is solidly build and we use wired setup. The mounting screws supplied is a joke (tool short and small). But this is minor since you always supply your own mounting screws anyway in order to customize it. The only minor issue I have is the picture not as bright and sharp as the open lens camera (which we have). Not sure if this can be adjusted. Otherwise, everything work as advertised

Reviews.Title: Not bad but expect zero support!
Reviews.Author: James T. Culmone
Reviews.Content: They want to charge me $12 for a missing bracket that should have been in the sealed box??//I sent this to Agasio support and got the reply below.I purchased an A622w from Amazon.com and did not receive a mounting bracket in the box. I do have a bag of screws and plastic anchors. Also, the included disk is un-usable on slot loading CD drives which includes all Macs and many PC'sPlease switch to full size CDs.Hi James,The camera was not purchased directly through us, we can still send out an paypal invoice for $12 for the replacement bracket and ship it to you asap.Best Regards,AhmedFoscam Digital Technologies LLCSupport Team1-800-930-0949support@foscam.us[...]Let me know how I'm doing! If you have any praises or complaints, please send them to feedback@foscam.us!Best Regards,AhmedAgasio Digital Technologies LLCSupport DepartmentDirect: (+1) 713-893-78661-800-930-0949support@agasio.com[...]

Reviews.Title: Great unit for the cost
Reviews.Author: J. Rice
Reviews.Content: I have two of these units for gate security at work.  They work very well and I am very satisfied.  The only con I have is at night, there is a 'halo' effect of the nightvision lights reflecting on the inside of the plastic dome.  Also, if there are outdoor lights at night, the reflection off the dome makes it difficult to see.  The daytime picture is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Occhipinti
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera from amazon, and have had it for about 3 weeks.  Let me give you the skinny.  Lets start with the cons first:1. Garbage documentation.  This camera comes with this tiny booklet.  This booklet has text written in what has to be 4 pt type.  It's a chore, and ridiculous to try to read.  The garbage documentation doesn't stop in the printed realm.  I own a mac, and it was kind of funny to see the "mac documentation" for this device on the enclosed CD.  The documentation consisted of a plain text file, with 4 lines of content.  Poorly thought out, and poorly made documentation.2. micro-CD with drivers (good luck using the disc w/ a slot loaded dvd drive).3. Garbage software. Comes with browser-based software.  Does what you need it to do, but the creators obviously failed their classes in interface design, or didn't know any better.  Oh well.4. Haloing of infrared light at night around lens.5. Minor learning curve.  To use this, you should have BASIC knowledge of how IP addresses and ports are used.  It's not rocket science, but not something I would be confident having my grandmother, or even parents set up.6. No N connectivity, only G.  boooo.----------Pros:1. Good build quality. This thing is solid.2. Good picture quality. Excellent during the day, OK during the night (despite aforementioned haloing effect.)3. Garbage software negated by free, high quality, open-source alternatives on the internet.  Just do a Google search, or consult your app store.4. So far, operated it in 20 degrees F overnight, so decent temperature operating conditions. Waiting for a -20/-30 evening for the real test!----------So overall, this is a decent product for the price.  Most of my problems were with the crap documentation, and software.  No biggie though.

Reviews.Title: Agasio customer support
Reviews.Author: terri sanchez
Reviews.Content: Wireless connectivity problems. Spoke with Harry Foster and he was very helpful and resolved the issue quite quickly.  We own 2 cameras.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera, solid build, features are lacking.
Reviews.Author: James E. Shride
Reviews.Content: recently installed several of these units.Cons:Units cannot seem to take a "position one" programing point. Meaning they will occasionally return to factory neutral. I suggest wiring it up and see what it points, then mount the camera so that point is what you want to see the most.Units use unsigned ActiveX, this is a giant PITA for IE usersAll the people who say that IP cams need high technical competence to set up aren't really techy, its as easy as 1. Find the IP your router leased out. 2. stick that IP in a browser 3. enter username and pass 4. config your little heart out. THIS CAMERA greatly complicates that (Active X issues). Once that's figured out though, its good to go.Its not PoE. That would be awesome if these things were PoE!Pros:CHEAP!Easy to set up, if you understand how network devices generally work.Very tough construction!I'm glad I can't see in the IR spectrum cause this sucker would BLIND ME! VERY CLEAR in total darkness! Our installs light up a big parking lot.PTZ is good, Zoom is digital, but ok. Pan and tilt has a very good range of motion.Conclusion:Mount them high up, use the default aim point for your aim point if possible.Remember, this ain't PoE and you will need to provide AC to the mounting area. So that can change your cost profile unless AC is already in place.Worth using for the right people, over a very good camera. Personally some solid firmware revisions would make all the difference.We are using Ispy Connect for DVR software, these cameras work well. NOTE: I am not using any of the audio features.if I can answer any questions for you please email me atjim at jimshride dot comThanks!

Reviews.Title: Nice outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is a nice product, and for me was easy to install. I have installed several cameras previously so if you are familiar with it, that makes it easy.  I get great pictures at night.  I did not have a problem with the cord, it fits nicely coiled into the bracket housing.  The only issue I have is that I would have preferred to mount the camera on the ceiling, but the mounting bracket that comes with the camera is only to mount on the wall.  It's still fine.  It has pretty good range to pick up the wireless because the camera is quite a distance from the Access Point.  I like the fact that this camera works with the other FOSCAM viewers, so if you have another camera you don't have to have two applications to view the image.  You can do multiview on one!

Reviews.Title: Um, wireless?  So why do I have to hook up wires?
Reviews.Author: Chad Shell
Reviews.Content: The good- well packed- pretty easy to install- good instructions however make sure to have PC close by cause they a on disc only- lots of embedded features found on more expensive cameras- very inexpensive for PTZ that's outdoor rated with featuresThe bad- requires wires, no battery option so u still gotta run wires for power- using IE browser, which is the only browser that supports all the functions including recording, it locks up the whole computer... Tried on a few computers with same result if using IE 8 or 9 32 bit, if you use 64 bit it doesn't work at all but doesn't cease up PC- using other browsers like chrome & Mozilla, it works okay but only supports live view or snap shots- wireless vs wired connections is way different performance.  (so if you have to run a wire may as well wire it and not bother with wireless)- zoom didn't work out of box (thus defective)- housing screws are simple non secure Philips heads which are easily tampered with.  And since they are a weird metric size, not easy to find to replace at the typical places you'd go.- 1st time configuration for a novice with networking is not intuative in the event you have a problem.  I guessed what my problem was and was right ( the port they want you to use was considered a possible threat so my router blocked its use).- no tech support... So I didnt need it but I'm not a network novice

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: Joseph Salvaggio "gabbiano"
Reviews.Content: camera operates perfectly. easy setup easy internet access. good picture, good color. first rain camera filled up with water. I bought this as it was advertised to be suitable for outdoors. Customer service was quick and I am waiting for a replacement. I hope it was just an exception and that the new camera will not fill up with water because in every other respect it was perfect.Their customer service is excellent. The company is concerned about your satisfaction. I have 2 other cameras from foscam which are both flawless.

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622W Suck
Reviews.Author: housemouse
Reviews.Content: The IR Illuminator in this camera can not be used at night. It causes a halo rendering the image unusable. What is the purpose of building a camera with an IR Illuminator if it doesn't work. Over all design of the camera is bad. When panning the entire dome moves, try doing this in the winter time...good luck.DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Roy Brown
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and installation, Works as good as one that costs much more. recommend to anyone just starting with surveillance.

Reviews.Title: WIFI CAM
Reviews.Author: Martin K. Myers
Reviews.Content: I like it but the last one broke down (it was replaced by Amazon which is great) but I will like this even more if it lasts a year.

Reviews.Title: It's a reasonable low price camera
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: The software has no signature, so working with Windows IE is VERY limited or not possible.  I have yet to find a way to use the advanced features with ANY browser, IE, Firefox, Safari.  The camera works, with both wired and WiFi.  The tilt angle could bebetter.

Reviews.Title: Great enclosure, shaky software
Reviews.Author: Kevin Cossaboon
Reviews.Content: - Software for the Mac is non-existant, and the website recommends some shareware app?- Windows software is on a mini-disk that will not go into a iMac slot drive- change ip, reboot (1), change Admin password, reboot (2).. add ssid, reboot (3), each is a minute a bit irritating- EvoCam will see it as a Foscam Network Camera (1), Pan and Tilt, no zoom (see below)- Tried to use Chrom on OSX to control the camera, and left, right up, down (pan and tilt) worked great, no zoom.- Tried to use the Windows IE, and not being a windows guru, being hammered with this is blocked, install this and that, but now that is blocked, and to un RAR something I now have a new tool bar? (How do people deal with windows.) Finally got it working, no Zoom.- no Zoom, oh wait the product is described and sold as NO ZOOM, then why was I trying it? Because the manual that comes with it CLEARLY calls the camera a PTZ, shows how to ZOOM, but it is not there.Net, Net, the housing that this sits in is very nice, and would look good on the outside of a house. After initial setup and reboots, the built in software is OK, and if your using something like EVOCAM to control it you never really deal with the embedded software.

Reviews.Title: great inexpensive outdoor cam
Reviews.Author: gene
Reviews.Content: a lot for the money!  Needs to mount on a deep box to make room for it's cable harness. but well built.  Similar to Foscam pan/tilt models.

Reviews.Title: review of A603W Wireless Camera
Reviews.Author: denfaro "denfaro"
Reviews.Content: Sandra Williams  The service has always been very helpfull, and the picture is of very good color. The only negative is the remote operation is very sensitive, it will record a leaf or a bear with the same setting.

Reviews.Title: Very nice outdoor Pan and Tilt camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I had stationary cameras from Foscam prior to this purchase.  One went bad and I wanted to get a replacement so picked this one out after looking for some IP outdoor cameras with Pan and Tilt.  This camera has a better lens angle and I can "see" a lot more than just my sidewalk and now I can also pan around to take in almost 360 degrees of action.  Picture is good enough for anything I would need and not that difficult to set up a FTP connection to store pictures.  I have it wired and am not using the built in wireless, but would really recommend this for anyone wanting a nice IP camera.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Smilch
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Agasio A622w outdoor camera to keep an eye on my property in Florida.It scans and has infra-red for night vision which is what sold me.I am able to control the camera from my iphone and ipad.After weeks of working great, I could not access the picture remotely today...I called technical support...after 10 minutes on hold, they were able to fix my issue very quickly.The technical support professional, Ralph Mendez was able to access my computer remotely and fixed the problem (static ip address) in seconds.He also showed me the steps so that I can fix it myself if it ever happens again.I also have 2 indoor foscam cameras which work great.Thanks for your service.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: luvit
Reviews.Content: I love this, it is very well made. I replaced another night vision FOSCAM that does not move, it was the best I could find at the time. This one can be moved remotely, has a much wider viewing angle, and true colors come through. The old cam without the IR filter would make green things appear pink. This came was a little more expensive but well worth it, it looks better and works better. It was as easy to set up as the others I have. In order to get it to transition from cat5 to wireless you need to unplug the cat5 30 seconds into the restarting countdown on the screen.I did see what others mentioned about the IR lights causing a haze or fuzzy view during night vision. In my opinion big woop. On one corner of the (very clear) picture is a little hazy, it really blocks nothing so bothers me not.I like this and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Dan Chuey
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these along with 3 Loftek CXS2200s.  I love both models.  I use the IPCam FC app on my Apple products which works good for me.  If I could change anything about the A622W it would be 2 things...1 - Allow custom scans.  When you turn on the scan/pan/patrol option, you get a lot of areas I do not want scanned (e.g. great up-close pictures of my house's siding, etc).  If you could program a custom area to scan, that would be great! ...hint, hint2 - Come up with a different transformer.  The one included is a standard wall wart.  Meaning you have a black box with AC prongs sticking out of it.  You either have to drill a hole in your wall (not an option for me since I just built my house) and plug it in a wall socket or you have to plug it in to an outside socket (not too secure from the bad guys).  I intend on installing weatherproof single gang boxes near my outside sockets to better secure the wall warts. However, I am concerned about heat in the summer.  I could install a landscape light power supply but they are big and bulky and also are easy to unhook.The images are great during the day.  There is a little haloing at night, but not terrible.  I wish I had more lighting in my cul de sac to see a longer distances, but the lighting I have on my house allows me good visibility of my driveway, front yard, and front door and windows.  You can't tell who is approaching, but you can see someone is.  Once they get close to the house with the lighting I have, I can make out exactly who it is.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: Brian Santos
Reviews.Content: awesome product set up instructions could be better my wife did google search on set up that was the ticket her being a network administrator did not hurt either, product does everything as advertised when set up properly.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam For The Price
Reviews.Author: PJ "Peter"
Reviews.Content: I have 3 Foscam cameras. 2 are indoors. they work very well day and night. Very good picture. I replaced a Foscam outdoor with the Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless Pan/Tilt IP Camera with IR-Cut. Setup is the same as with other Foscam cams. The picture is excellent during the day and at night quite good. Yes a halo is created by the led lights but within the halo is a pretty clear picture when pitch dark outside. The price is excellent for what it is. I have had this up and running for 2 wks without problems. I live in the northeast and was concerned about how the camera would operate in cold weather. Well it has been down to 0 with 2 snowstorms leaving 14 inches and haven't had a problem. The PTZ works perfectly. I use Blue Iris software and the cam works great with it. Motion detection works great. I give it 5 stars because you get what you pay for and for the price this is an excellent cam. Check it out on my website [...].There is a 24 hour time lapse down my driveway and a link to live video from the cam.

Reviews.Title: ip camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera worked as advertized. There is a small halo with the night vision but for the price you can not beat it

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: S man
Reviews.Content: Product shipped right away, it was in new condition. I would trust the supplier with future orders of their products.It was easy to setup and it has worked good. Sometimes I have to cut off the power to it and let it restart (reboot)and it comes right back on .

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Terence McNally
Reviews.Content: Contacted support to assist with set up of the camera.  Support technician was extremely helpful and resolved the issue very quickly.

Reviews.Title: TECH SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: WALTER P CHASE
Reviews.Content: I WAS HAVING A PROBLEM WITH WIRELESS ACCESS.  RALPH MENDEZ HELPED ME WITH THE SET UP.I HAVE CALLED FOSCAM TECH SUPPORT BEFORE AND THEY ARE ALWAYS VERY HELPFUL.

Reviews.Title: Foscam

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Technical support!

Reviews.Content: I was unable to forward my port for remote viewing.  Felix did a great job fixing my problem.  The camera is working very well.  I am very happy with it and would recommend it and the company.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support

Reviews.Content: We had so much unknown problems, called cutomer services and, Kate, had it all hooked up within minutes! Woohoo! Now we can monitor our system from the iphone from anywhere!

Reviews.Title: Not Bad...
Reviews.Author: C. Powell
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Camera and have it setup on a beach location. It works great. There was only one time during a night mode that you could not see at all. I am not sure what was wrong but other than that incident its worked well.Great camera for the price would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: super
Reviews.Author: Stacie
Reviews.Content: very clear picture. very simple to operate. as well as the wireless is super strong. I have the item set up aprox 250' away from cisco ap and have very strong signal. I am testing this product for other clients. also the night vision is very clear as long as no light. I own my own computer company and will recommend this product to my clients who want reliable video screening.

Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Jamiern
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera!  Very affordable and works as stated. Picture quality in daylight and night is awesome!  Was able to use on vacation out of the country in St Lucia to monitor home without any issues. Tech support was fantastic and hooked up the cameras wirelessly via remote access for me. Well worth the minimal cost to have it done for me. Also, needed ongoing tech support to add a wifi booster and Scott at tech support was great!!!  Hooked up the booster without a problem. Would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting real time monitoring for home, office, etc... well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Real Rating 3.5 stars
Reviews.Author: B. Wong
Reviews.Content: The real rating for this camera is 3.65 stars. I assume all the none verified buyers are fake since they did not buy it from AMZN.So averaged out to be 3.65 with all the verified buyers.I am currently looking for a wireless camera and found out that 3 stars and under are all verified buyers in every camera that I looked so far. with 4 or 5 stars, that's where the none verified buyers are. interesting, check it out yourself, don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Great IP Camera
Reviews.Author: iamyru
Reviews.Content: The camera was very easy to set up and performs all the tasks I want it to. The software is pretty standard among IP cameras and I have no complaints about it. I am using this camera wirelessly and have had no issues. Picture quality is great. The night vision works very well through the dome and the camera itself is fairly attractive outside of my house.

Reviews.Title: customer support

Reviews.Content: I had an issue to view the camera on the blue iris software . spoke with harry foster he took the remote acess and was able to make it work quickly and also helped me with the remote acess .... it was great to have harry's help. they are always able to solve and problem quickly.

Reviews.Title: customer support

Reviews.Content: The Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless Pan/Tilt IP Camera was easy to set up when it was directly connected to a computer, a little more difficult to set up in wireless mode, but so far I have been unable to establish connection remotely. The set up instructions are very poor. Not clear how to access the camera from a remote computer of smart phone.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Harold Schur
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and technical support. Had a little trouble setting it up but the technical support people are great. They had me up and running in no time. Great value for a wireless remote camera. Wonderful picture quality. Sharp. Highly recommend this camera . Very affordable. Lots of bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: great costumer service
Reviews.Author: amazon customer
Reviews.Content: great costumer service. wireless and remote access great. affordable able to watch kids and be at peace.Camera quality is wonderful. I would recommend this camera to be purchased!!!

Reviews.Title: tech support

Reviews.Content: I am happy with the camera i have. I can view my camea wirelessly and remotely anytime and anywhere I go.Leo fro tech support was very nice and helpful in fixing my problem with the changes in IP addresses

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: jross2v
Reviews.Content: I have more than one brand of camera. I find the AGASIO Wireless to be the best to work with. It is easy to set-up and get going.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Bruno Rauch
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 5 cameras from Foscam and I am happy with all the different models. The Tech support is very good especially Sandra who was helping me out today. She was very knowledgable and also very friendly. I certainly will by any additional camera I need from Foscam.Thanks you all. Bruno

Reviews.Title: That's an improved amazing CAMERA
Reviews.Author: R.D.
Reviews.Content: By far it has exceeded our expectation based on quality and compared to it's price. How can you go wrong??Recommended for all amateur and semi-Pro.

Reviews.Title: Agasio A622W Wireless outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Daddyo-yo
Reviews.Content: I do like this camera. It can capture image in complete darkness at least 50'. It did have some haloing in the image but still quite good. I had issues in the setup process but after a very short conversation with Sondra Williams at Foscam (where I purchased the product) she was able to correct my issue. I am very pleased with the support I received from her. Now the camera is working like a champ!

Reviews.Title: It works great with Fedora 17
Reviews.Author: Hal E Meyer
Reviews.Content: It works great. I am using Fedora 17 Linux and found the commands online, so I can program it anyway I want.

Reviews.Title: TECHNICAL SUPPORT

Reviews.Content: Kate ..WAS SUPERB....VERY VERY FRIENDLY AND EFFICIENT..WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND TO RESOLVE MY ISSUES...VERY VERY EFFICIENT...VERY HAPPY I BOUGHT THE EXTRA SUPPORT...WORTH EVERY PENNY..A PLUS WORK.

Reviews.Title: agasio camera tech support

Reviews.Content: Calvin Harris rocksextremely patient very very knowledgeable ...assisted with everything I asked for. All cameras work perfectly now! I would recommend this product. I am very happy with the service provided by him.

Reviews.Title: agasio customer  service
Reviews.Author: Rod
Reviews.Content: Issue was video flas from blue,yellow, red and fram jumping, we reset camera and now all is working fime, and spoke with Harry Foster, he was great support and patient with me. Good Man!,support said it is defective so we sent it back and order another one,and it works great accept for nightvision it issue is that the IR emitters at night actually reflect back into the dome glass and make the view a rather fuzzy, and useless rendition of whatever the camera is pointing at.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera NO ZOOM
Reviews.Author: Rich Harmon
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera for the price, Better picture Quality that my DVR system cameras. The only down side to this camera is no ZOOM

Reviews.Title: foscam ip
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: great camera once you get it up and running. the techs at foscam are great, they will work with you to make sure it works properly.

Reviews.Title: a622w
Reviews.Author: Julie Schillinger
Reviews.Content: camera works well, good picture quality,support was outstanding, would by another one.would reccomend this product.support was was and simple .

Reviews.Title: Awesome Value
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I dont normally write reviews, but this product exceeded my expectations. The camera worked perfectly right out of the box. They included a sticker on the Cam with setup information that made it easy. The image is clear as the camera came pre-focused. The Pan and Tilt work great, but there is no zoom. Not a big deal for me, just a mention. The camera is easily viewed from my iphone using a 3rd party app called LiveCams Pro. This camera looks at my dock on Tampa Bay and the construction looks sturdy enough to last thru some of our storms. I plan on purchasing a couple more for the corners of my home. Don't hesitate to purchase this camera.

Reviews.Title: Cameras/Support
Reviews.Author: Newt
Reviews.Content: Excellent product and easy to set up wirelessly.  Contacted Calvin @customer support who remotely connected and fixed all issues within 15 minutes.  It works! Could not be happier.

Reviews.Title: Customer supprot

Reviews.Content: The camera is working well.  And the tech support I used was very helpful in doing a remote installation for me.  I needed help with the install. It was too complicated for me to do alone. Tech support was only $39.

Reviews.Title: Agasio Support for A602W IP Camera

Reviews.Content: I have a new Agasio a602W camera that stopped sending wireless signal.  I was able to speak with harry foster with technical support and he quickly corrected the problem and I am back in business.  Thanks Harry for the help and patience.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tech support.
Reviews.Author: David E. Long
Reviews.Content: Anzen, did an excellent job walking us through the process.  He took control of the computer and showed us step by step how to install and then use our new cameras and made the experience so worry free.Excellent job.

Reviews.Title: Agasio camera support

Reviews.Content: Calvin did a good job today. Quit a bit of settings had to be changed but most of it is working now.I was really interested in the camera nightview and the resolution.

I still have not been able to get the camera to start working because I am totally confused with the directions.  It will take someone a little more technical than me to figure this one out.  All in all, it is a nice piece of equipment, but not sure how it works just yet.

Reviews.Title: Awesome customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Accessible Anywhere!

Reviews.Content: This camera has excellent picture, sound and range of motion. i would highly recommend purchasing Foscam cameras. Very Satisfied and limitless features that are very useful. Easy to use and excellent customer service!

Reviews.Content: The features  which I  like about the camera :higher quality image, wireless, compressionThe reason I made the call to the Tech Support:no live video visableMy Comments on the service provided by the tech agent(Calvin Harris): Excellent fast service. Thanks a lot.

Reviews.Title: Foscam IP Camera FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Jason G Volz
Reviews.Content: Customer service was excellent - efficient, very helfpul - and was able to fully set me up in less than 15minutees.  Jees was my customer service rep for the setup and he did a wonderful job.Highly recommend this company.

Reviews.Title: good customer service
Reviews.Author: acder
Reviews.Content: After buying a new router, my camera would no linger work wirelesly.  I called FOSCAM  support and JEES straightened it out quickly and efficiently.  I give both the camera and the support 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Remove from wish list
Reviews.Author: Phuong
Reviews.Content: I added this camera to my wish list for few moths waiting for the price dropping to reasonable and take it. But today I read the 1 and 2 star reviews I decide to take it out of my wish list. I trust the low star review though. I am not sure how can I give star for it, since I want to notify people whom just look at star to make decision to buy it so I will give it one star though.

Reviews.Title: tech support
Reviews.Author: Frenchie
Reviews.Content: unable to set up my ip camera for remote control, needed help, very satisfied.will recommend the camera and support help was great.thanks Felix

Reviews.Title: IP Camera
Reviews.Author: Olaf
Reviews.Content: Unable to to Iphone and Ipad Called tech service and Sandra William walked me through and and corrected and everything is working. Great service and like the camera.

Reviews.Title: IP Camera installation
Reviews.Author: Zwi
Reviews.Content: I had an excellent experience working with Foscam to install three IP Cameras.  I worked with Kate, who was patient and got through all of the problems we faced.  I highly recommend the service and the IP camera.Wansview Wireless IP Pan/Tilt/ Night Vision Internet Surveillance Camera Built-in Microphone With Phone remote monitoring support(Black)

Reviews.Title: IP Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Montee
Reviews.Content: Called several times to get help from Foscam and they were a great help each time I called.  They helped with the port forwarding, and the networking (wireless and wired) to great success.  The instructions within the camera were good and simple I just needed a bit more help which was easy to get with the help line.  Ralph Mendez was particularly helpful and helped me complete the installation and setup.  I am very satisfied with the cameras and the tech support and would recommend Foscam and Agasio Cameras to anyone who is in the market for a ip camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with great features , wonderful tech support as well
Reviews.Author: Dennis F. Colligan "Dennis C"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera two weeks ago and while its UI is a little different from older Foscam models it is loaded features. I did experience a minor software iusse during install and needed to call Foscam tech Support which I have never done before or needed to. I have installed over fifty Foscam cameras and generally never needed  help. so, now I needed some help with a few features. I called Foscam tech support and spoke with SANDRA and I was very impressed with her knowledge and speed. she was able to guide me to setup a few features correctly and a pleasure to deal with. love the camera and the support from Foscam...thanks to the Foscam team and SANDRA !

Reviews.Title: customer support
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: was unable to make the cam work wireless . spoke with Harry Foster he was able to make the camera work wireless and also helped me with port forwarding so i am able to view the cam remotely with my  static remote ip address .  Service was very helpful

Reviews.Title: Correction on the product I purchased
Reviews.Author: William M. Mclean "William McLean"
Reviews.Content: I was unable to make my camera work wireless and also help in making it work remotely . spoke with Harry Foster he was able to make the camera work wireless and remotely also he was the rep was knowledgeable of the camera and how it worked he was excellent The item that I purchased from Amazon was the Wansview model NCB541W night vision wireless indoor camera that the review I wrote was referred to. I do not know why the system changed the item I purchased to the one shown.  I did not buy the Agasio camera. WM

Reviews.Title: Ip cam
Reviews.Author: hercules
Reviews.Content: Issue:Opening up the camera. Problem with active X. It is fixed and the camera is now wireless and it is port forwarded and the camera is working well.Sandra, was super great in her help.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: jonnieg
Reviews.Content: I just purchased Agasio Camera thru Foscam and am very pleased with the product and the support I received from Felix Anderson. I would recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA SETUP
Reviews.Author: Curtis
Reviews.Content: CALVIN HARRIS WAS VERY HELPFUL SETTING UP MY CAMERA. THIS CAMERA IS On the corner of home and all of the features are working to perfection.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM, EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Filippo Intile
Reviews.Content: FOSCAM AND CALVIN HARRIS, one of the telephone techinacal support that assisted me, on multiple occassions, are the best support that I ever have used in my life.I highly, recomend FOSCAM, but I especially recomend FOSCAM for their telephone superb techinal telephone support.I just wish they would have had techinaca support sooner.Sincerely,Filippo

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased so far....
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: The instructions for this camera are very limited but I am Happy with the camera so far.Model M166iThank you Calvin Harris from Technical Support for helping with the audio connections

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: tonijo
Reviews.Content: Calvin Harris is the tech support person I talked to.  He helped me to hook up the camera to my external hard drive and to my I-phone.  He took the time to work with me, and was very understanding about the help I needed. I could not have asked for a better professional to help me with the problems I was having.  He was wonderful.The Foscam Camera model #F18602W has very good day time and nighttime vision.  It is a really great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: A622W
Reviews.Author: sugaAR
Reviews.Content: Service was good from tech support. I did find out that because I have a older foscam ip camera I would have to update my old software to view my new Agasio A622wwith my old foscam. Thanks for your help Rick

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Hamer
Reviews.Content: All I can say the product is fantastic, the delivery is on time, Even If you are an ordinary user, you will be able to install it with no problem, for the price comparing to the options is excellent, I wish if this product also support zooming, I would buy three more, Please let me know, when it is available. Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
22 IR LEDS for 50 feet (16 meters) NightVision - Features an IR-Cut Filter for true and accurately colored images (e.g., greens appear green rather than grey or brown); Wi-Fi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g - 640x480 Resolution; 0.3 Megapixel (Synology & Blue Iris Compatible)
Supports 355° Pan, 80° Tilt - Features an Auto-Iris function which automatically adjusts the lens depending on lighting conditions so images do not appear washed out and do not require manual brightness adjustment; Supports M-JPEG video compression - Supports wireless encryption using WEP, WPA and WPA2 - Motion detection alerts via emailed images and FTP image upload
Features an IP66 hardened outdoor waterproof enclosure; Provides for remote viewing & recording over the local network or the internet through a PC or mobile device (including Iphone, Android & Blackberry); Supports DHCP, fixed/static IP and PPPOE - Multi-level user management and password protection - Allows for remote viewing and recording from anywhere in the world through the internet - Supports DDNS for dynamic IP address stabilization
Supports smartphones (Iphone & Android) as well as standard browsers (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Safari, Chrome)
Simple to setup with an easy to use graphical interface; Motion Detection with email image notifications and image upload via FTP
ProductInfo.Name: Agasio A622W Outdoor Wireless Pan/Tilt IP Camera with IR-Cut Off Filter for TRUE COLOR Images (Not Washed Out), Auto-Iris (Auto-Brightness Adjustment), IP66 Waterproof Enclosure, 50ft Nightvision, 4mm lens (72° Viewing Angle), Synology & Blue Iris Compatible, Pan 360° Tilt 90°, White
